summaries.title: # Click
summaries.summary: Click is a Python package for creating beautiful command line interfaces in a composable way with as little code as necessary. It's the "Command Line Interface Creation Kit". It's highly configurable but comes with sensible defaults out of the box. It aims to make the

summaries.title: ## A Simple Example
summaries.summary: ```python import click @click.command() @click.option("--count", default=1, help="Number of greetings.") @click.option("--name", prompt="Your name", help="The person to greet.") def hello(count, name):
